name: Medarot Navi: Kuwagata Version
overview: This spin-off was the first Medarot game for the GBA. Unlike the other entries in the series with their charge/cooldown "relay race" cycles, Medarot Navi features a tiled 9x9 map. Movement and Part Actions are carried out using "Action Points" that are distributed at the beginning of the turn and expended when a Medarot acts.
